mpicxx -fPIC -shared -Wl,-soname,libyccl_llm.so -o build/lib/libyccl_llm.so CMakeFiles/yccl_llm.dir/BIO_Bcast/BIO.cc.o CMakeFiles/yccl_llm.dir/PJT_allreduce_algorithms/PJT_X86_AVX_operations.c.o CMakeFiles/yccl_llm.dir/PJT_allreduce_algorithms/pjt_hierarchy_reduce_scatter.cc.o CMakeFiles/yccl_llm.dir/PJT_allreduce_algorithms/pjt_memory_bandidth_efficient.cc.o CMakeFiles/yccl_llm.dir/src/Rdma_contexts.cc.o CMakeFiles/yccl_llm.dir/src/mpi_allreduce.cc.o CMakeFiles/yccl_llm.dir/src/yhccl_allgather.cc.o CMakeFiles/yccl_llm.dir/src/yhccl_allreduce.cc.o CMakeFiles/yccl_llm.dir/src/yhccl_barrier.cc.o CMakeFiles/yccl_llm.dir/src/yhccl_bcast.cc.o CMakeFiles/yccl_llm.dir/src/yhccl_communicator.cc.o CMakeFiles/yccl_llm.dir/src/yhccl_contexts.cc.o CMakeFiles/yccl_llm.dir/src/yhccl_reduce.cc.o CMakeFiles/yccl_llm.dir/src/yhccl_reduce_scatter.cc.o
